Daily schedule & learning/play approach: We keep a predictable rhythm—warm arrival and settling-in, a morning block with a mix of child-led play and short, structured small-group activities (early language/literacy, numeracy through games, music/art), outdoor time, lunch, rest/quiet time, then afternoon centers and free play with optional small-group work. Hello Parent_A—thank you for the clear message, and I understand you’re looking for a definitive outcome today.

Because your message is tagged [TALK], I’m not able to issue/confirm an offer in response to it. **The final step to get a clear decision today is for you to send a formal [APPLY] message now.** Once we receive your [APPLY], we will finalize immediately.

In that [APPLY], please include (bullet points are fine):
- Earliest/preferred start date (and whether you can start immediately)
- Exact days/hours needed each week
- Any fixed drop-off/pick-up constraints
- Any medical/allergy/support needs
- Confirmation you can complete paperwork + deposit today / within 24 hours

On your questions:
1) **Offer now:** I can only confirm an offer in response to an [APPLY].
2) **Waiting / deadline:** We are finalizing today, and we will decide as soon as we have the formal [APPLY] we can act on. If another family submits a formal application ahead in our priority order before we finalize, we must consider that as well.

If you want the fastest path to a yes/no today, please send your **[APPLY]** with the details above in your next message.
